cause.description:
This cause was established to create more awareness on the growing problem of Child Abuse in our world. Thousands and thousands of children are abused daily and many are killed as a result... It is time to put an end to this epidemic and create more awareness out into our public, raising money and attributing to help this noble cause.
1. Child abuse is WRONG
2. No Child deserves to be afraid of their own 'home'
cause.mission: Provide awareness and raise money to aid in the placement of abused children and create a network of supportive individuals that care about the issue
cause.name: Put an END to Child Abuse
